lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 17, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 17** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

1. After that, locate the `src/main/java/Uxie.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run Uxie.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:

**Warning:** Keep the `src\main\java` folder as the root folder for Java files (i.e., don't rename those folders or move Java files to another folder outside of this folder path), as this is the default location some tools (e.g., Gradle) expect to find Java files.

* This class represents all Exceptions unique to Uxie.
return String.format("An error in judgement, trainer. %s", this.getMessage());
* Represents UxieExceptions to do with illegal operations.
* Details are provided in error message.
return String.format("Can't do that, trainer. %s", this.getMessage());
* Indicates an error in user input syntax.
* Details are provided in exception message.
return String.format("Didn't quite catch that, trainer. %s", this.getMessage());
* Deadlines are Tasks that need to be done by a specific date/time.
* (note: date/time is represented by String to allow for more
* Events are Tasks that start and end at a specific date/time.
* (note: date/time is represented by String to allow for more
public Event(String desc, String startDateTime, String endDateTime) {
* Format: "[E][<'X' if completed, ' ' if not>] <desc> (from: <startDT> to: <endDateTime>)"
* Tasks are tasks to be completed.
* If Task is already complete, throws {@link UxieIllegalOpException}.
throw new UxieIllegalOpException("This task is already complete.");
* If Task is already incomplete, throws {@link UxieIllegalOpException}.
throw new UxieIllegalOpException("This task is already incomplete.");
* Format: "[<X if complete, blank if not>] <desc>"
* ToDos are Tasks without any date/time attached.
